name: Carbon-ENG
description:
[Only available for Windows, Linux or Mac.]

This game aims to raise awareness of the current state of the forests and demonstrate ways to reforest a forest through an interactive story, where the player takes control of a drone that is mandated to plant trees!

It's a game that does not take up much of your time and allows you to learn more about the global environmental situation.

Made by Harieiv with Ren'Py. Note: This is the English version of the original game. Please report any translation bugs to me!
